title: Email Send Button grayed out in Thunderbird
content: Send Button is grayed out when I enter an email address, but if I enter an email address from the contacts list it show up and everything works fine.
creator: errlewis

title: ERRO - Barra de ferramentas da filtragem rápida
content:
QUando uso a "Barra de ferramentas da filtragem rápida" para procurar mensagens com uma palavra específica, às vezes a mensagem não aparece nos resultados. Outras vezes, ela aparece, mas ao clicar abre uma mensagem diferente, que não corresponde ao filtro aplicado.

Já tentei reparar as pastas e entrar no "modo de solução de problemas" mas nada adiantou. Compactar todas as pastas e Ativar pesquisa global e indexação estão ativos.

Como poderia corrigir isso? Obrigado Carlos
creator: carlos8

title: Unable to add new email service
content: I am attempting to add a Netzero email account to Thunderbird. I keep getting an error telling me password, or username or server maybe wrong. I've compared the settings i'm using with the settings I used to add this Netzero account to another device and they are identical. Netzero is a POP3. Any thoughts?
creator: mlvolosyn

title: カードビューからテーブルビューに変更したが、再起動するとカードビューに戻る
content: ［設定］→［外観］から［テーブルビュー］、［非スレッド］、［降順］に変更して、スレッド表示と並べ替えの設定の適用先を［既存のすべてのフォルダー］をクリックすると、起動している間はこれらの状態になっているが、Thunderbirdを終了して再起動すると設定が下に戻ってしまいます。 これは以前からではなく２ヶ月前頃から生じています。 この問題を解決する方法を教えて下さい。
creator: ess-ke

title: Can I edit a received email?
content:
The previous answer to this message isn't compatible with the current v142 of TB. I used this feature all the time when using Outlook 2019 before I switched to TB and I really miss it. I was able to clean up incoming messages to remove the many indentations and other unwanted formatting.

Is there anything that works with the current release of TB?
creator: rv4fun
